"Smart" Calculator: A calculator that can predict future calculations based on previous inputs ands suggestions accordingly.
"Visual" Calculator: A calculator that displays calculations in a graphical format, making it easier to understand and visualize the math.
"Multi-lingual" Calculator: A calculator that can perform calculations in multiple languages, making it useful for people who work in multilingual environments.
"Memory" Calculator: A calculator that has an expandable memory, allowing users to store and recall frequently used calculations or formulas.
"Collaborative" Calculator: A calculator that can be used collaboratively by multiple people, allowing them to work on the same calculation in real-time.
